class.name: DojoPlayerAchievementQuery
class.deprecated: Will be replaced by 'PlayerAchievementQuery' in a future version.
class.brief_description: A query for retrieving player achievements.
class.description: This class is used to query for player achievements. It allows filtering by world addresses, player addresses and namespaces.

members.member: An array of namespaces to filter by.
An array of player addresses to filter by.
An array of world addresses to filter by.
